name: Daniela’s Inferno
description:
Beware the nights of sparkling lights

Before the moon has waned, The dark will rend your furry friends
From courtesy ingrained…
The full moon has made Daniela's familiar go beserk! Help Daniela dodge stray fireballs and put out flames.

Move – Arrows/WASD keys
Pick Up/ Use Water – SPACE

How long can you survive?

Lyra Shillabeer - Lead Programmer, Art
Jacob Hannam - Programmer
Kirstyn Smith - Audio
Gene McKechnie - Art
Izzy Raymond - Music
